timeline.bodyText: minor nit: first time I read the code, the name Factory implied to me that new instances would be returned for each call, since this is providing singletons (memoized instances), maybe rename this class to ...Provider, or ...Holder?
timeline.author: fabiokung

replies.bodyText:
Provider would be better suffix, but it is used by Guice, and it would be confusing.
I will try to find a better name.
replies.author: tbak

replies.bodyText: well, I already used ...Provider in some other places :-)
replies.author: fabiokung

timeline.bodyText: Since these are now centrally managed, would be nice to have gauges that show their current size.
timeline.author: corindwyer

replies.bodyText: I am working on metrics in another PR. I will include this as well.
replies.author: tbak

timeline.bodyText: you can drop this TODO, I wanted to use jackson instead of gson to get support for immutable POJOs, but it's not worth the effort
timeline.author: fabiokung

timeline.bodyText: probably safe to remove this try catch now and the return null below
timeline.author: fabiokung

replies.bodyText: This method throws checked exception. Wrapping it with IllegalStateException
